title: Naruto
author: Masashi Kishimoto
description: Naruto follows Naruto Uzumaki, a young ninja striving for recognition and dreaming of becoming the Hokage, the leader of his village. The series blends themes of adventure, martial arts, and fantasy, spanning over 72 volumes and concluding in 2014. It remains one of the best-selling manga of all time, with over 250 million copies sold worldwide.

title: Attack on Titan
author: Hajime Isayama
description: Attack on Titan is set in a world where humanity faces extinction at the hands of giant humanoid creatures known as Titans. The story follows Eren Yeager and his companions as they fight to uncover the truth behind the Titans and the history of their world. The manga concluded in 2021 and has achieved global acclaim for its plot twists and dark themes.

title: One Piece
author: Eiichiro Oda
description: One Piece tells the story of Monkey D. Luffy and his pirate crew in search of the legendary treasure known as 'One Piece' to become the next Pirate King. With its ongoing run since 1997, One Piece holds the record for the most copies sold of any manga series, surpassing 500 million globally.

title: Death Note
author: Tsugumi Ohba
description: Death Note follows a high school student named Light Yagami who stumbles upon a notebook that allows him to kill anyone by writing their name in it. The manga explores psychological themes of justice, morality, and power.

title: Bloom Into You
author: Nio Nakatani
description: Bloom Into You is a yuri romance manga that follows Yuu Koito, a high school student who discovers her feelings for her classmate Touko Nanami. It explores themes of love and identity, making it a popular series within the yuri genre.
